song_lyrics: Me to sherī vaḷāvīne sajj karī,
preme bāndhyā re tariyā toraṇ dwār... 2
bhāve bhojan re kīdhā vividh prakār... 3
Me to palang bichhāvyo prīt shu,
Hu to chātak sarkhī thaī rahī,
tam kāraṇe re pyārā prāṇ ādhār... 5
tene vikh sam re thayo sarve sansār... 6
have shu kahu re ghaṇu vāramvār... 7
title: Aksharnāth āvo māre orḍe

metadata.kirtan_info:
2-1: Sadguru Muktanand Swami

Category: Shri Harina Pad
